summary: The module offers a tutorial implementation of a Line Graph Neural Network using DGL and PyTorch. It defines core GNN components that operate on the line graph derived from a citation dataset, includes data loading, preprocessing, and simple utilities for batching, sparse conversion, and visualization, focusing on conceptual clarity rather than performance.
business_intent: Educate users on building and training a line‑graph based graph neural network, demonstrating graph transformations, message‑passing mechanisms, and model construction for research or learning purposes.
